law.catch_line: Payment Of Benefits In Accordance With Requirements Of Internal Revenue Code
law.text: [Text of section applicable as provided by 2009, 21, Sec. 26.] A retirement system subject to this chapter shall pay all benefits in accordance with the requirements of section 401(a)(9) of the Internal Revenue Code and the regulations in effect under that section, as applicable to a governmental plan as defined in section 414(d) of the Internal Revenue Code.
